Title: Enacts the higher education community service act to promote volunteer service by higher education students
Summary: Enacts the higher education community service act to promote volunteer service by higher education students; creates a council for higher education community service to regulate and recognize persons and programs associated therewith; requires a report to the governor, temporary president of the senate and speaker of the assembly.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "higher education community service act"
